text: Jamie-Lynn Sigler (born May 15, 1981) is an American actress and singer born in Jericho, New York. ==Career== She is best known for playing Meadow Soprano in The Sopranos. She also played call girl Heidi Fleiss in an American television movie. She was born in Jericho, New York. ==Personal life== In January 2016, Sigler revealed that she was diagnosed with multiple sclerosis when she was 20 years old. ==References== Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:American television actors Category:1981 births Category:People with multiple sclerosis Category:Living people Category:People from Jericho, New York
title: Jamie-Lynn Sigler
